flawed_nl_solution:
The quarters came to 4*25=<<4*25=1000>>1000 cents
The dimes were worth 3*10=<<3*10=30>>30 cents
The nickel was 5*1=<<5*1=5>>5 cents
So he paid 1000+30+5=<<1000+30+5=1035>>1035 cents
Since he got 4 cents as change it cost 1035-4=<<1035-4=1031>>1031 cents

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
